items.title: Target early Black Friday LEGO sale now live: Up to 40% discounts, including Advent calendars at new lows from $18
items.summary:
Target has launched its limited LEGO early Black Friday deals through November 8, giving us some significant savings on a large collection of building sets, including some of the 2025 Advent Calendars. Among the lineup, you can find sets like the 2025 LEGO Star Wars Advent Calendar at $26.99 shipped, which matches the rate at Amazon, as well as the 2025 LEGO City Advent Calendar at $17.99 shipped, which is unavailable at Amazon, but does beat out the early Black Friday deals from Best Buy. These two would normally fetch $45 and $30 were it not for the discounts, which we’ve recently seen taken to these rates for the first time, giving you 40% markdowns to new all-time low prices, saving you up to $18 off the going rate in the process. Head below for more on these and the other sets we’re seeing included in this sale.

items.summary:
Amazon is now offering the Dyson V11 Origin Cordless Vacuum at $399.99 shipped, which is not only matching in price at Dyson, but there you can also get a complimentary furniture cleaning kit (valued at $70). Normally fetching $570 at full price, discounts have mostly kept the costs above $468 over 2025, with the only previous falls lower being to this same rate during both of this year’s Prime Day events. You’re looking at another chance to score it here with a $170 markdown back at the lowest price that we have tracked this year. You can also find the standard Dyson V11 Cordless Vacuum package at the same rate, with the difference here being the included attachment tools.

It would normally cost you $100 at full price, with discounts having only beaten this rate once in 2025 during July’s Prime Day event, when it fell to the $64 low. Today’s deal comes in as a repeat from last month’s Prime Day, giving you a $30 markdown from the going rate for the second-lowest price we have tracked. You’ll also find the 99-foot model down at $89.99 shipped from $130, the 164-foot model at $149.99 shipped from $200, and the 328-foot model at $299.99 shipped from $400.

items.title: Govee’s Matter Outdoor Garden Lights 2-pack drops $80 to a new $120 low
items.summary:
Update 11/6: Govee has dropped the price further on these Matter Outdoor Garden Lights to a new all-time low of $119.99 shipped.

Through the official Govee Amazon storefront, we’re getting a return to the best pricing on the brand’s Outdoor Garden Light 2-Pack at $129.99 shipped. This new lighting device has been on the market since June and carries a full $200 price tag outside of discounts, which we saw keeping above $140 until three weeks ago when Prime Day gave us the first drop to the $130 low. Things have kept above $150 in the weeks since, with that low price returning here today. You’ll be getting a $70 markdown while the deal lasts, landing it back at the lowest price we have tracked.

more…

items.title: Winter vacation planned? Bag this 3-piece luggage set in various styles from $140 (Reg. $180)
items.summary:
Coolife 3-piece Luggage Set

Buy for $140 (Reg. $180)

What we love

This affordable luggage set is comprised of 20-, 24-, and 28-inch pieces that features an ABS construction that the brand touts as both “lightweight” and “durable.” When it comes to luggage from the bigger brands, it’s easy to spend this much on just one piece, so it’s not a bad idea to cash in if you need a new set.

items.title: Turn a single outlet into 9 power sources with this surge-protected extender for $8
items.summary:
Addtam 9-in-1 USB-C Outlet Extender

Buy for $8 (Reg. $12)

What we love

For just $8 Prime shipped, this outlet extender comes out of the gate swinging with lots of features. First off, it only requires one wall outlet and can convert that into 9 power sources that include 6 AC, two Type-C, and one USB-A. It also packs surge protection and a rotating design.

items.title: Casual users can get the iOS experience for less w/ rare iPhone 16e deal at $174 off (Refurb, 1-yr. warranty)
items.summary:
The iPhone 16e isn’t exactly the most popular model in the lineup and, despite being the most affordable, it is still a little too pricey for some folks just looking to land a casual Apple handset. The most affordable config will run you $599 straight from Apple, and deals on unlocked units have been very hard to come by from trusted sources and major retailers, which is why today’s offer from Amazon’s Woot outlet at $424.99 Prime shipped might be worth a look. 

more…

items.title: Score Anker’s tiny 30W charger with USB-C cable for $14 (Save 39%)
items.summary:
Anker Nano 30W Charger with USB-C Cable

Buy for $14 (Reg. $23)

What we love

When it comes to wall chargers, 30W is a pretty balanced solution that can generally power a wide range of devices from smartphones all the way up to power-efficient laptops like MacBook Air. This unit is super compact too, spanning roughly 1.1 by 1.1 by 1.4 inches. The included USB-C cable is a nice bonus too.
